channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Lawmakers Brawl, Stalling Vote on Bills Expanding Checks on President
item.description: An attempt by lawmakers from Taiwan's Democratic Progressive Party to stall a vote on bills that would expand legislative oversight resulted in a daylong brawl in the legislature.

item.title: Analysis: What Do Taiwan's Legislative Fights Mean for Lai Administration?
item.description: Democratic Progressive Party lawmakers' attempt to postpone a bill from passing on Friday resulted in an all-out brawl. New Bloom Magazine's Brian Hioe describes Taiwan's history o

item.title: Southeastern Taiwan County Gets First PET Scanner
item.description: Taiwan's southeastern county of Taitung just got its first PET scanner, a piece of medical equipment that helps detect cancer at early stages.

item.title: Rescued Formosan Black Bear Returns to the Wild Â
item.description: A one-year-old Formosan black bear has been released back into the wild after months of treatment for an injury it sustained from a snare trap.
